guide.introduction: I felt in love with Laser Harps the first time I saw Jean Michel Jarre play it live in concert (Rendevous 2 song). Since technology has developed so much it is now possible to build your own homemade DIY Frameless Laser Harp.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I felt in love with Laser Harps the first time I saw Jean Michel Jarre play it live in concert (Rendevous 2 song). Since technology has developed so much it is now possible to build your own homemade DIY Frameless Laser Harp.

Relevant parts
  • Protoboard
  • Arduino Uno
  • Green Laser Pointer
  • Resistor 220 ohms 1/4W
  • Power Supply, 5V DC, regulated 1A minimum
  • Power Supply, 15V DC, regulated 5A minimum
  • Power Supply, 9V DC, regulated 1A minimum
  • ULN2003
  • Jumper Wire
  • 2N2222 TRANSISTOR
  • LDR Light Sensor
  • MIDI jack
  • 5k TRIMPOT
  • Wine Cork Stopper
  • Small Mirror Piece
  • Green Laser Safety Goggles
  • White Gloves
  • Step motor
Tools
  • Aligator Leads
  • Glue
  • Insulating tape
  • Long Nose Pliers
  • Multimeter
